SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.client.view
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view

Class GuiView

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GuiView
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameView
public class GuiView extends javafx.application.Application implements GameView
This class is the GUI view, it extends Application and implements GameView. It contains all the methods to load the scenes and to show them.
See Also:
  • GameView

    • rearrange

      public List<Integer> rearrange(List<Item> items)
      This is the rearrange method, not used in the GUI.
      Specified by:
      rearrange in interface GameView
      Parameters:
      items - the items to be rearranged.
      Returns:
      null, because the GUI handles the rearrangement itself, so this method shouldn't be called.

    • playerNumberError

      public void playerNumberError()
      Sets an error message in the player number scene, but since the number of players is set by a slider, which minimum and maximum are valid, this method is never called and does nothing.
